original_text: And he did what was right in the eyes of the Lord, and walked in the ways of David his father; and he did not turn aside to the right hand or to the left.
korean_text: 여호와 보시기에 정직하게 행하여 그의 조상 다윗의 길로 걸으며 좌우로 치우치지 아니하고

sentences.original_text: And he did what was right in the eyes of the Lord
sentences.korean_translation: 그는 여호와 보시기에 정직한 일을 행하였고

sentences.original_text: and walked in the ways of David his father
and he did not turn aside to the right hand
